channel.title: HolyPkerz - AllstarScape Edited
channel.description:
[center][b][size=14pt]HolyPkerz - Edited AllstarScape[/size][/b]
[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
[size=10pt][b]- Anti Syi (1 connection per ip) - Anti Trade and Telegrab Dupe (Laws are taken out of Server) - Great Economy (Really, I'm serious...) - Ogre Bow Glitch Fixed - Barrows Glitch Fixed (Before you Needed Range as well as Defense to Wear) - New Players List (says the ranks of players and the pk points) - All Skills go to 130, Makes people play longer (takes no time at all to get 99's, then it's just boring)[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][b]Pictures Showing More Server Features:[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][b]All Skills go to Level 130 [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/Skillsto130.jpg[/img]
Staff Zone Rare Box Fixed (Only Mod+ Can Get the Rares) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/StaffZoneBox.jpg[/img]
Ticket System (Only Way for Regular Players to Get Rares) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/TicketInfo.jpg[/img]
Xp Minigame (Gives Attack, Strength, and Hp, You Have to Raise Defence Yourself) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/Xpmini.jpg[/img]
Rune Armor Trimming! (Need Crafting) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/ArmorTrimming.jpg[/img]
You Can Cook Sharks and Mantas! (On Regular Allstar you Can't) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/Cooking.jpg[/img]
Smithing a Dragonfire Shield! (Only Way to Get One, 130 Smithing) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/DFSMaking.jpg[/img]
Smithing Godswords! (Only Way to Get Godswords, 130 Smithing) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/GsminiandGodswords.jpg[/img]
Godsword Stance? CLOSE ENOUGH [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/GsStance.jpg[/img]
Need Level 130 to Get into the Guilds [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/Guilds.jpg[/img]
Information on How to Get Some of the Items [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/ItemInfo.jpg[/img]
Rares Were Given Very Good Strength Bonus so People would Pk with them [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/PartyHatStrBonus.jpg[/img]
The Main Rares Were Taken Out of the Shops and Monster Drops [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/RaresShop.jpg[/img]
Meat Tendy and Godswords were Taken Out of the Shops (Tendy Dropped by KBDs, Rare Drop) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/ShopwithTendy.jpg[/img]
You Get More SkillCapes by Clicking the Chest (Taken Out of Shops) You Can Only Get the Ones You Earned [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/SkillCapeChest.jpg[/img]
SkillCape Trimming! (Need 130 Crafting) (Only way to Get a Trimmed SkillCape) [IMG]http://i863.photobucket.com/albums/ab200/HolyPkerz/AllstarScape%20Edited%20Pics/SkillCapeTrimming.jpg[/img][/b][/size]
[b]Credits[/b]: Mod Allstar and KickingJamie
[b]Please Comment and Let me Know What You Think[/b]
[b]Source Download With Trade (anti dupe):[/b] http://uppit.com/pvumzp3og63v/HolyPkerz_Allstar_Scape.rar ^ New Link, I deleted a lot of unneeded data that I missed the first time so it should be a much faster download
Client is Silabsoft Downloaded: http://www.mediafire.com/?o0kyv2187bp1fm7
[/center]
